articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary from day two of the 2024 Cheltenham Festival.
articles.title: Cheltenham Festival 2024 LIVE: Day 2 races, results, text & radio coverage

articles.description: Wales and British & Irish Lions centre George North announces he will quit international rugby after Saturday's Six Nations finale against Italy.
articles.title: North announces retirement from Test rugby

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at the players who will be hoping to shine in friendlies against Brazil and Belgium before Euro 2024.
articles.title: Last chance for England hopefuls to impress

articles.description: Jurgen Klopp says Michael Edwards' return to Liverpool is "top news" but does not affect his own decision to leave at the end of the season.
articles.title: Klopp's Liverpool exit unaffected by Edwards' return

articles.description: Maurizio Sarri, who led Lazio to second place in Serie A last season, resigns after a fifth defeat in six games.
articles.title: Sarri resigns as Lazio manager

articles.description: Wales centre George North will play his final international game after being recalled for the Six Nations match against Italy in Cardiff.
articles.title: Wales recall retiring North and Tompkins for Italy

articles.description: There is no reason why Japan cannot become one of the world's top four teams, head coach Eddie Jones said.
articles.title: Jones wants Japan to be top-four team

articles.description: "English football is finished" if Premier League clubs cannot agree a "competitive and sustainable" deal with the English Football League, says Preston North End executive director Peter Ridsdale.
articles.title: English football finished without EFL deal - Ridsdale

articles.description: Arsenal goalkeeper David Raya proved his doubters wrong as Gunners progress in Champions League, says BBC Sport's Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Raya delivers when it matters most for Arsenal

articles.description: England number eight Ben Earl says he does not regret his emotional comments after the Six Nations victory over Ireland.
articles.title: 'I felt it, I meant it and I stand by it'
